author: @@official.shinkai

wallet_sk.description: 64-character hexadecimal EVM wallet private key. Required for blockchain interactions

description: Automates web interactions and extracts data using Stagehand.
name: Stagehand Runner

commands.description: Ordered array of automation commands. Each command requires action, id, and payload fields

action.description: Command type: goto (URL), wait (delay), extract (data), act (interact), goto-stage (nav), observe (monitor)

id.description: Sequential command identifier (1-based). Must be unique within command list

jsonSchema.description: JSON Schema defining structure of extracted data. Optional - uses default if not provided

payload.description: Action-specific data: URL, milliseconds, prompt text, or stage ID. Format depends on action type

data.description: Array of data objects extracted by 'extract' commands. Structure follows jsonSchema if provided

message.description: Status message indicating automation sequence completion or error details if failed
